scripts.docker:clean: docker rm -vf $(docker ps -aq) && docker rmi -f $(docker images -aq)
scripts.docker:push: docker tag gcr.io/web-scraper-455220/web-scrape-fe gcr.io/web-scraper-455220/web-scrape-fe && docker push gcr.io/web-scraper-455220/web-scrape-fe
scripts.docker:deploy: gcloud run deploy web-scrape-fe   --image gcr.io/web-scraper-455220/web-scrape-fe   --platform managed   --region europe-north1   --allow-unauthenticated   --project web-scraper-455220
scripts.deploy:k8s: kubectl apply -f frontend/fe-deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f frontend/fe-service.yaml
